summary: After her birthday party, ad executive Michelle finds herself caught between cheerful Tony, dreamy Bill, youthful Jeb, and rich Tiger. Overwhelmed with stress, another complication quietly forms in her life.
cast: Bingbing Fan|Aarif Rahman|Daniel Henney|Leon Lai|Zheng Xu|Pace Wu|Jinfu Jiang|Hongjie Ni|Wei Liu|Qing Yang|Xinying Zhang|Yat-Fei Wong|Ming Zhao|Yang Peng|Eva Jin|Yiyi Jiang|Xiaoxi Tian|Antonio Anuk|Chengpeng Dong|Qianyi Ma
title: One Night Surprise
